RelatedSentence: London - The chairman of Britain 's AstraZeneca said on Monday he saw no prospect of a deal with US drugmaker Pfizer before a deadline of May 26 set under UK takeover rules , or any likelihood of that deadline being extended .

London - The chairman of Britain 's AstraZeneca said on Monday he saw no prospect of a deal with US drugmaker Pfizer before a deadline of May 26 set under UK takeover rules , or any likelihood of that deadline being extended .

RelatedSentence: Leif Johansson also told Reuters that it was Pfizer , not AstraZeneca , that called an end to discussions on Sunday afternoon about a potential takeover to create the world 's largest pharmaceuticals company .

Leif Johansson also told Reuters that it was Pfizer , not AstraZeneca , that called an end to discussions on Sunday afternoon about a potential takeover to create the world 's largest pharmaceuticals company .
Johansson said he and AstraZeneca chief executive Pascal Soriot had spoken with Pfizer chief executive Ian Read for more than an hour on Sunday afternoon .

RelatedSentence: We spent the whole of the weekend engaging , culminating in a telephone discussions with Ian Read and the ( Pfizer ) chief financial officer on Sunday afternoon , together with me and our chief financial officer and chief executive , Johansson said .

We spent the whole of the weekend engaging , culminating in a telephone discussions with Ian Read and the ( Pfizer ) chief financial officer on Sunday afternoon , together with me and our chief financial officer and chief executive , Johansson said .

At the time of the call , the two sides were still discussing an offer submitted on Friday night worth 53.50 pounds a share and Johansson said he was given no notice that another offer was coming at 55 pounds , valuing the business at some $ 118 billion .
